body: @sydneyitguy I get `error: "No video found"` for every video I submit. Could you double check this?
@cyh76507707 Could you please list the title and description for each page?

Main title: TV Hunt - Daily top chart for videos
Main description: TV Hunt is a daily top chart for videos. Anyone can simply share a cool video that they found today. No sign-ups are required.

- Sub page: video_title - TV Hunt
- My Uploads: My Uploads - TV Hunt
- My Votes: My Votes - TV Hunt
So I'm using <Icon type="sound" /> from antd, but unfortunately there is no "muted" type in the icons. Could @cyh76507707 possibly create it?
It should be bound in the latest push.

Oh it was actually the 3rd one gets voted and re-sorted.. lol
Yeah that's confusing. We can resolve this issue by
1. The sorting should not be changed when user clicks voting. It should be changed on page refresh.
2.  Re-sorting happens after 1 second delay, with slide animations so users can see items are moving

I think option 1 should be enough and much simpler.
Yeah it was confusing, so I thought about adding a slide animation, but I agree with you. Will go with #1 for now.
Actually, it loads properly. It just doesn't auto play on load since iOS doesn't allow it. Let me see how to work around this issue.
Fixed.

I handled the crash, but the empty status should be handled @ggomaeng 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1332279/68918514-cab9c700-07b1-11ea-859e-ee8ca232686d.png)

I guess we can just put that loading screen on right, 
and just show
```
You haven't uploaded any video. 

[ HUNT VIDEO NOW]
```
message on right
Should we implement it in an infinite scroll way such that it loads automatically at the end?

Yeah I guess infinite scroll is better than "LOAD PREVIOUS DAY",
especially when there's "SHOW MORE FROM THIS DAY" link too.

We can just make that "SHOW MORE" and use infinite scrolls for the daily buckets
We can handle infinite loading by..
- [ ] When there's no items on a day, try the next day until it returns no items for 10 consecutive days
This happens when I go into "My uploads" or "My votes" menu as well
Close it in favor of #34
@ggomaeng Seems I cleaned up most stuff, please double check if I did anything wrong or missed something
What's a good number of letter count to truncate the video title?
Looks good to me! Thank you for doing this :) -- I was going to nifty things up before launch.
Should be fixed in 1881f010

I don’t think we need to truncate the titles ourselves in this case. 

Google only shows certain number of characters for title (70) and description (160), but there’s no hard limit technically. So let’s just leave the full string for google to truncate.

Closing because Youtube Iframe API uses "playsinline" variable in the constructor to determine if it's going to be played inline for mobile devices. I don't think it's possible to change this behavior after it's been constructed unless we destroy the object and reinstantiate it. I think this is why neverthink.tv also doesn't allow fullscreen method on mobile devices.
Went with #2 in 887d8cf7
Must have been removed while refactoring. Reimplemented 1st checkbox in e5348865.
https://github.com/Steemhunt/tvhunt-web/commit/ca082c19a5df2940d759729475c5e8422f2cfb50

"Please join the ranking curation now" -> something like "Share a 😂video you discovered today"

"CHECK NOW" -> "UPLOAD NOW" (go to submit page)

Also.. Shouldn't we change the word "upload" to "share" ?
Because users don't technically "upload" videos on our website.
Menu title "My Shares" sounds bit weird though... 
any thought? @cyh76507707 @ggomaeng
It handles space key and comma right now. I added the tab in a2dab685.
How about "Shared Videos" or "My Shared Videos"?
Happened due to the length of text. Fixed in cab6ceea
